overview_of_class: Continuation of linear algebra and 291-1. Multivariable differential calculus. Emphasis on theory and proof. Prepares students for 300-level mathematics courses such as 321 and 331 as sophomores. Students may not receive credit for both 240 and 291-1; 230 and 291-2; or 234 and 291-3. Prerequisites: one year of calculus (usually in high school) and consent of the department.
name: MENU: Intensive Linear Algebra and Multivariable Calculus
title: WCAS MATH 291-2-61 MENU: Intensive Linear Algebra and Multivariable Calculus

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Continuation of linear algebra and 291-1. Multivariable differential calculus. Emphasis on theory and proof. Prepares students for 300-level mathematics courses such as 321 and 331 as sophomores. Students may not receive credit for both 240 and 291-1; 230 and 291-2; or 234 and 291-3. Prerequisites: one year of calculus (usually in high school) and consent of the department.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisites: one year of calculus (usually in high school) and consent of the department.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value:
Lecture: Three 50-minute lectures weekly
Discussion section: One 50-minute discussion section weekly, including a quiz
Problem sets: Weekly written assignments
Class participation: Encouraged, but not required

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value:
Exam, final: 30% of grade
Exam, mid-term: Two mid-terms, each worth 20% of grade
Problem sets: 15% of grade
Quizzes: 15% of grade, lowest score dropped

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: Students may not receive credit fro both 240 and 291-1, for both 230 and 291-2, or for both 234 and 291-3.

subject: MATH
